text: Metropolitan Cornelius Jakobs ( or secular name Vjatšeslav Vassiljevitš Jakobs, or Vyacheslav Vasilyevich Yakobs, ; 19 June 1924 – 19 April 2018) was the Metropolitan bishop of Tallinn and All Estonia, the head of the Estonian Orthodox Church of Moscow Patriarchate from 1992 until his death in 2018. He was born in Tallinn. He became the oldest bishop of the Russian Orthodox Church and celebrated his 90th birthday in 2014.Metropoliit Kornelius tähistab 85. sünnipäeva (ERR Uudised, 19 June 2009) Jakobs died on 19 April 2018 in Tallinn at the age of 93.Suri Tallinna ja kogu Eesti metropoliit Kornelius ==References== ==Other websites== * Корнилий, митрополит Таллинский и всея Эстонии (Якобс Вячеслав Васильевич) on Official site of the Russian Orthodox Church * Tallinna ja kogu Eesti metropoliit Kornelius * Message of Kornelius Mitropolitan of Tallinn and all Estonia * ESTONIA: MOSCOW ORTHODOX CHURCH FINALLY REGISTERED (Keston News Service, 19 April 2002) Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Eastern Orthodox bishops Category:People from Tallinn
title: Cornelius Jakobs
